name: Telex-to-GitHub Issue Tracker
description: Automatically creates GitHub issues from messages in a Telex channel.

settings.label: Telex Webhook URL
settings.description: Enter the webhook URL that listens for Telex messages.

settings.label: GitHub Repository
settings.description: Enter the GitHub repository where issues should be created (format: user/repo).

settings.label: GitHub Access Token
settings.description: Enter your GitHub personal access token for authentication.

settings.label: Issue Title Format
settings.description: Choose how issue titles should be generated.

settings.label: Include Message Body
settings.description: Include the full message body as the issue description.
